root: ^Hello my friend! is always nice to see a new face here, we don't have to many visitors.
^Have money on your pockets? I have all kind of stuff, like this all power healing pill, you probably need it at the moment, I'm right?
^I'm fine now thanks, you won't ask me how I know your name?
^Is written in my bag, I'm not that fool you know?
^I see, so you are a peddler then?
^That's right! going town to town buying and selling that's my job.
^Maybe you saw what happen to me last night then.
^Sorry man, I went to sleep early yesterday.
^It's okay, if I need something I will let you know.
